thread.title: Nexa Resources S.A. Announces a Share Premium Distribution of US$80 Million

author: cnbc.com
title: Nexa Resources S.A. Announces a Share Premium Distribution of US$80 Million
text:
LUXEMBOURG--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Nexa Resources S.A. (NYSE:NEXA) (TSX:NEXA) (“ Nexa Resources ” or the “ Company ”) announces that the board of directors of the Company (“ Board ”) resolved today to distribute a share premium to its shareholders in an aggregate amount of US$80 million, which is equivalent to US$0.600057697 per share (“ Share Premium Amount ”).
The Share Premium Amount will be paid on March 28 th , 2018 and shareholders owning shares on March 14 th , 2018 will be entitled to receive the respective Share Premium Amount. Shares will be traded ex-dividend on the Toronto Exchange Stock (TSX) and New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) as of March 13 th , 2018.

About Nexa Resources S.A.
Nexa Resources is a large-scale, low-cost integrated zinc producer with over 60 years of experience developing and operating mining and smelting assets in Latin America. The Company operates and owns five long-life underground mines, three located in the Central Andes of Peru and two located in the state of Minas Gerais in Brazil. Two of the Company’s mines, Cerro Lindo in Peru and Vazante in Brazil, are among the 12 largest zinc mines in the world and combined with the Company’s other mining operations, place the Company among the top five producers of mined zinc globally in 2016, according to Wood Mackenzie.
